Articles.Content:
Hi fellow kerbonauts. I've just discovered this wonderful game in the past week and I'm completely hooked.

I now have lots of craft orbiting our home planet and one on Mun.

One question though. I somehow have one of my Kerbal dudes in orbit going EVA. Has anyone tried rescuing an AWOL kerbal in orbit, is it possibe?

It is not only possible, in career mode, you will often get contracts to do it. If you're not clear how, there are several threads in the gameplay questions section.

Welcome to the forum.
